content: वीर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Heroic, brave. {@--2@} Mighty, powerful. {@--3@} Excellent, eminent. --रः {@--1@} A hero, warrior, champion; कोप्येष संप्रति नवः पुरुषावतारो वीरो न यस्य भगवान् भृगुनंदनोऽपि <ls>U. 5. 34.</ls> {@--2@} The sentiment of heroism (in rhetoric); it is distinguished under four heads; दानवीर, धर्मवीर, दयावीर, and युद्धवीर, for explanation see these words <ab>s. v.</ab>. {@--3@} An actor. {@--4@} Fire. {@--5@} The sacrificial fire. {@--6@} A son. {@--7@} A husband. {@--8@} The tree Arjuna. {@--9@} A Jaina. {@--10@} The Karavīra tree. {@--11@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. --रं {@--1@} A reed. {@--2@} Pepper. {@--3@} Rice-gruel. {@--4@} The root of Uśīra <ab>q. v.</ab>
